JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: We are looking for a student worker for the youth culture house Mejeriet in Sønderborg
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a happy, smiling student worker full of initiatives, for Mejeriet. The student worker will be a part of a team of two student workers, who will have each their own focus; one will focus primarily on youth between 15 – 19 years and the other will focus on youth between 19 – 30 years.
Your task is to create the content in Mejeriet and help us build an environment, where all young people are welcome and feel welcome. In addition, you will support young people and volunteers that are a part of Mejeriet. You will be a part of creating a youth culture house where everybody feels comfortable, wants to meet up, eat together and create activities and projects together.

Therefore, the youth culture house, Mejeriet, is looking for two students over 17 and under 30, who knows what is needed to create good and fun activities and events.

Tasks could be:

  • Create events and activities
  • Help organizations find the right locations for their activity
  • PR for activities in Mejeriet on Facebook and Instagram
  • Make sure that all young people in Sønderborg Municipality knows about Mejeriet
  • Be present in Mejeriet at events and activities, you plan and carry out
  • Make sure there is a nice and cozy vibe in Mejeriet
  • … and have good ideas!

We expect you to:

  • Be positive, open and reliable
  • Be a student in Sønderborg Municipality (for example at a secondary education or higher education)
  • Have a good network at your educational institution, and also in general
  • Be at least 17 years old

You will 7 hours per week, primarily afternoon, evening and sometimes during the weekend.

You will be employed by Sønderborg Kommune.

You will start work from August 15th, 2022 to June 30th 2023, and will be employed under the HK-agreement for clerks.

Application deadline is May 27h, 2022 and we expect to have interviews on the 8th and 9th of June, 2022.

If you have questions, you are welcome to contact youth coordinator, Ida Ketelsen Hansen

tlf. 27 90 45 52, mail: idhn@sonderborg.dk.

Send the application electronically. Click on "send application (send ansøgning)" and attach your application and optionally your resume and relevant appendices.
